706729f-a.text:
Sheffield Ave., north of Glenmore Ave. The frame peaked structure at the left behind the telegraph pole, was once Piel Bros. Casino. It is now
(1929) a part of Piel Bros. Beverage Mfg. Co.
April 1929.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
706729f-a.folder: Sheffield Avenue & Glenmore Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
